name: homework-angular-js-meteo
description: ** Final homework for JS course ... Yaaay !!! Create a NodeJS application that will notify a list of email receivers about next day meteo. - The application needs to be started as server (you can use **express** for that) - At a regular interval of time, a request to a public meteo api will be done that will get meteo data for a city (Chișinău for example) - If a receiver email didn't received an email with next day meteo data, an email with needed information will be sent - Data, as the email list, needs to be included in a **config.json** file that will save data between sessions
author: Topala Mihai
